Posts.Content: CherylHanson wrote: I always thought I had decent health insurance and just received an insurance statement for my first chemo treatment (Adriamycin, Cytoxan, and Taxotere).  While insurance paid plenty, this statement indicates that I will owe $870 to the oncologist's office.  If correct, my six cycles alone will cost me out-of-pocket over $5,000 and this doesn't count all the other associated expenses of breast cancer.  Is this normal?    Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Price $$$ of Chemo CherylHanson mrs7148
